work.name: Lee Lab
work.summary: Conducting research on Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) project integrated with VR gaming. Developing and integrating deep learning models with Unreal Engine for real-time BCI data processing and VR interaction.

work.name: Human Augmentation and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (HAAIL)
work.summary: Research on Feature Imitating Networks in biomedical image processing.

work.name: Henry Ford Health System
work.summary: Contributed to a pilot grant program funded between Henry Ford Health System and MSU. Research on radiomics features with machine learning.

work.name: Game Development Studio
work.summary: Developed indie games, focus on technical side of games. Mentored by professionals from Iron Galaxy Studio.
